Package store.business.util.logger

Class FilteredLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.business.util.logger.FilteredLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger
    public class FilteredLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger

    The filtered logger

    Filter over the Predicate of Level and logs if the test is conclusive. It implements the public interface Logger interface

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Raphael Dray
    See Also:
    Logger, Predicate, Level
